info.author: Mikel Larreategi
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
=====================
cs.togglecanonical
=====================

Sometimes the edit form of translated content items is completely unusable
due to the two-50%-width-column hardcoded in the template.

But having in the same page the canonical content and the translated one
is a very nice feature.

With this product a new action will appear in a LinguaPlone enabled
content-types in a multilingual site to allow users to show and hide canonical
content on-demand using a Javascipt action


Changelog
===========

1.1 (2013-10-15)
-----------------

- Upgrade step from old versions
  [erral]

- Fix Javascript action
  [erral]

1.0 - (2009)
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: cs.togglecanonical
info.summary: Hide and show canonical language fields in Plone edit form

Sometimes the edit form of translated content items is completely unusable due to the two-50%-width-column hardcoded in the template.

But having in the same page the canonical content and the translated one is a very nice feature.

With this product a new action will appear in a LinguaPlone enabled content-types in a multilingual site to allow users to show and hide canonical content on-demand using a Javascipt action
